channel.title: Help will pay if requested
channel.description:
I need help fixing the following. - combat level displayed in game is incorrect example i am maxed and it says im 138 but when another players views me it show me as 114 - accept button on my trade is not working (IF YOU FIX THIS I WILL PAY HANDSOMLY) - fishing and smithing skill are not working
I am a new coder guys so give me some credit im here to learn.

item.title: Help will pay if requested
item.dc:creator: @callmedragon callmedragon
item.description:
@callmedragon wrote:

Okay so could i teamview you later on today if that alright and show me the fishing thing ive never had to fix that i would greatly appericiate it. What country you in?

Read full topic

item.title: Help will pay if requested
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

So you need to find the firstClickNpc packet and make the NPC ID of the fishing spot to execute the fishing method. Either that or the ID could be wrong there’s usually a couple of the same ones.

Try spawning and testing them.

Use already implemented first click NPC methods for reference.

Read full topic

item.title: Help will pay if requested
item.dc:creator: @callmedragon callmedragon
item.description:
@callmedragon wrote:

I have tried logging out, this is a project insanity server also and i dunno what the id for it is thats the problem you think you could help me out a little more please? And like the stuff for it is there like fishing spots poles nets etc all there but when you click the fishing spot nothing happens lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Help will pay if requested
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Okay for your information this is probably server sided? Anyway, all I can say is:

1: Try logging out and back in and see if that “refreshes” your combat level for the other player.
2: You will need the action button ID for the Accept Trade button and get it to do what it’s gotta do.
3: You will have to implement fishing and smithing yourself, try looking up a tutorial. I’m guessing this is a 508+ because of the 138 combat, so I cannot help you further.

Read full topic
